description: Main React component for Task Tracker app, including API integration, authentication, task management, theme toggling, and UI rendering.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component implementing task tracker UI, authentication, theme toggling, and API interactions.

methods.name: handleLogin
methods.description: Handles user login by calling API and updating state.

methods.name: handleRegister
methods.description: Handles user registration through API and updates relevant state.

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Logs out user, clears tokens, and resets user/task states.

methods.name: handleFetchTasks
methods.description: Fetches tasks from backend API and updates task list state.

methods.name: handleCreateTask
methods.description: Creates a new task via API and refreshes task list.

methods.name: handleDeleteTask
methods.description: Deletes a task via API and refreshes task list.

methods.name: handleCompleteTask
methods.description: Marks a task as completed via API and refreshes task list.
